content:
also available at free-crochet com 1 1 http //www free-crochet com/search html criteria=fc00247 **note ** you must register free on the freepatterns website to access the free patterns **materials ** *sparkling accessories* * bucilla twinkle-sheen 3 balls * bucilla steel crochet hook size 9 *old-time crochet* * metallic crochet cotton size 10 * steel crochet hook size 8 **gauge ** 12 double_crochet 4 blocks and 4 row = 1 published in *sparkling accessories for the home* by bernhard ulmann co in 1950 republished in old-time crochet magazine vol 19 no 2 page 16 pattern is charted
celt s vintage crochet archive link http //web archive org/web/20080312182123/http //www angelfire com/folk/celtwich/stardustfilet html other online sources freepatterns com free-crochet com celt s vintage crochet yahoo group
